author: Roger A. N Robotham

review: I bought the Fire TV Stick when it was on sale for Prime members.  I was really really stoked to be able to watch Showtime Anytime AND HBO Go on my TV.  I was using Chromecast for about a year before I made the switch, and I'm ready to go back.  I attempted to set up Showtime, only to find out I can't use my Xfinity login.  This is probably Comcast's fault, not Amazon's, but now I cannot use this device for the sole reason I bought it!  HBO Go is STILL not available, and when it is, who knows if I will be able to use it with Xfinity.  I have to hook the Chromecast back up to watch this season of Girls, which is really disappointing.Overall, the GUI is OK (not great, but it's not BAD) and the performance is alright.  I hate the android remote app though.It does its job with Prime, Netflix, and Hulu, which means the device works for me 9 or so months out of the year (when I don't need to use Showtime or HBO on it), but I'm still disappointed.
